tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CitizenFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  citizen_id INT,
  date_submitted DATE,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE citizen_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  citizen_name VARCHAR(100),
  feedback_date DATE,
  feedback_rating INT,
  feedback_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE program_feedback (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(100),
  program_date DATE,
  program_rating INT,
  program_comment TEXT
);
